Comments: My GI doctor gave me Alinia after recurrence of C-diff following a round of Vanco. I more or less refused to take Flagyl_ because of the horrible side effects. Doctor says it is "cutting edge" to prescribe Alinia for C-diff. The research is very recent_ but it suggests Alinia is just as effective as Flagyl or Vanco. My diarrhea stopped in two days_ and I feel fine.
